mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM RNUM, N.* FROM (select * from boardview2 where #{field} like '%'||#{query}||'%' order by regdate desc)N) where RNUM BETWEEN 1+(#{page}-1)*10 AND #{page}*10
select * from (select * from board where regdate < (select regdate from board where num = #{num} ) order by regdate desc) where ROWNUM =1
select * from (select * from board where regdate > (select regdate from board where num = #{num} ) order by regdate asc) where ROWNUM = 1
select * from board_comment where board_num = #{board_num} order by regdate asc
select * from board_recomment order by regdate asc
mapper.update: update board set hit=hit+1 where num = #{num}
